name: Squat
description: A compound exercise that targets the lower body, primarily the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound exercise that works the posterior chain, including the back, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise that primarily targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Overhead Press
description: A compound exercise that targets the shoulders, triceps, and upper chest.

name: Pull-up
description: A compound exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders.
